data.title: 准备以至少30秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: This picture is taken in a hospital. There are a female patient and a male doctor in the picture. They both look very serious. The male doctor is trying to figure out the illness of the patient. He is wearing a blue uniform. The female patient is sitting on a hospital bed and showing her hand to the doctor. She is wearing a white dress. Doctors save lives, but their importance goes far beyond that. Doctors also make a difference by helping patients minimize pain, recover from a disease faster or learn to live with a disabling injury. (98 words)
